column4: So… We did it, yesterday, huh?
We sure did. I'm so happy right now, you wouldn't believe it.
I might have a little baby. Our little baby. I cannot wait.
Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
We can't have a child, not yet.
I don't want to take the pill, I won't take the pill. You can't make me take the pill.
…I can't. You're asking for the impossible… Our little baby… It'll be the crystallization of our love….
….Okay. I will do it. For you. For us. Because I love you. Because I want you to keep being with me.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: Of course, dear. That was my intention from the start. It'll be the crystallization of our love. Our little baby.
You don't need to worry about anything. I'll take care of everything. Let's raise a whole family together once we're both grown up, okay?
